spaceplan
Class PathFindSpecification

java.lang.Object
  spaceplan.PathFindSpecification

public final class PathFindSpecification
extends java.lang.Object

Specification of path finding problem problem. It contains from/to points and vectors, plane parameters, maneuver constant lookup no flight zones and some support info for PathFinderByManeuvers.

Author:
Antonin Komenda
